title: Spanish Gold and Silver Map - Cause

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains the reason for the situation depicted in the map?

choices.label: European nations competed with one another for economic and political power.
The spread of maize cultivation led to economic development throughout the Americas.
The Spanish Empire cultivated trade alliances with Native Americans.
The Columbian Exchange stimulated population growth in Europe.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
